name: LRU Cache
description: Implement an LRU (Least Recently Used) cache simulation. Given operations as [operation, key, value] where operation is 'put' or 'get', and a capacity, return the result of the last 'get' operation. Return -1 if key not found.
hints: Use a Dictionary for O(1) access and an Array to track usage order. When capacity is exceeded, remove the least recently used item.
